patterns: How many branches are offered in Jain University?
responses:
Jain University offers Masters in Computer Applicaton with Specialization in Storage and Cloud Technology 
 & Information and Security Services

Management fees is 1,70,000 per course and 50% scholarship is available for government admission 
 and other scholarships are applicable for cap round students.

patterns: what is the rank of Jain University?
responses:
NIRF Ranking (2022) - JAIN (Deemed-to-be University) ranks 79th, the Faculty of Engineering and Technology secures 115th,
	 and CMS Business School secures 96th position in India

Established in 1990, Jain University originates from Sri Bhagawan Mahaveer Jain College (SBMJC), established by the founder
	 and chairman of JGI GROUP, Dr.Chenraj Roychand in 1990.It was conferred deemed to be university status in 2009
